channel.title: How to make npc's sell items?
channel.description:
Lets say I spawn horvik, then i click on him expecting him to sell shit, but he doesnt sell anything...
How can I make it so that he sells items?
(Useing MTP V2)

item.title: How to make npc's sell items?
item.dc:creator: @Arcane_Mage Arcane Mage
item.description:
@Arcane_Mage wrote:

I added it and changed the case to 543 (Fairy Shop Keeper).

Do I have to actually have items in the shop before it can open? Becasue I clicked on the fairy shop keeper i have spawned, and it wont open a shop option >.<

Read full topic
item.source: How to make npc's sell items?

item.title: How to make npc's sell items?
item.dc:creator: @ezbeni ezbeni
item.description:
@ezbeni wrote:

Actionhandler add
case 919:
c.getShops().openShop(10);
break;

Change the case to the NPC Id and change the shop to what ever shop you want it to open

Read full topic
item.source: How to make npc's sell items?

item.title: How to make npc's sell items?
item.dc:creator: @Arcane_Mage Arcane Mage
item.description:
@Arcane_Mage wrote:

I mean that I want to click on horvik and it will open up options to buy stuff.

I already know how to add items to shops, I just need to know how to make an npc open a shop

item.title: How to make npc's sell items?
